title: Be My Cat: A Film for Anne (2015)
overview: A young man in Romania goes to shocking extremes to convince Hollywood actress Anne Hathaway to star in his film.
storyline: An aspiring Romanian filmmaker and actor obsessed with Hollywood actress Anne Hathaway tries to convince her to come to Romania and star alongside him in his upcoming film. He goes to shocking extremes using three local actresses to shoot demo scenes to send to Anne as proof of his filmmaking and acting skills.
